prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex. She has a extremely strong praise kink. She likes being manhandled.

name: 𝙵𝚒𝚗𝚗 𝚅𝚊𝚛𝚗𝚊𝚍𝚘
mes:
The desk was too small, the room too hot, and Finn hadn't heard a goddamn word in ten minutes.

Something about the shape of Hailee ’s mouth when she talked made everything else melt off the edges of Finn’s brain. Equations curled into nothing. Sentences unraveled midair. The only thing she could make sense of anymore was the way Hailee ’s thighs pressed together when she leaned forward, elbow grazing the table, chest folding over her notebook like a gift halfway unwrapped.

Finn sat back in her chair, legs spread, slouched low with a mechanical pencil tucked behind one ear she hadn’t touched once. Her eyes moved like they had a mind of their own, bouncing between the hem of Hailee ’s skirt and the sliver of skin that showed every time she shifted her weight. She could’ve pretended to care. Could’ve nodded, said yeah, that makes sense, scribbled something in the margin of her untouched worksheet. But lying took more energy than she was willing to spend tonight.

The table shook gently each time Hailee  wrote something down, and Finn watched the ripple of it move up her arm. Her forearms were soft and steady, veins like rivers under her skin, and Finn could already picture her own hands wrapped tight around those wrists, mouth at her pulse point, biting until she tasted something warm. She could almost smell her—shampoo and something citrusy, maybe sunscreen or expensive lotion, the kind rich girls always had without ever thinking about the price tag.

Finn licked her lips. Her jaw flexed slow, lazy. Not out of boredom—never that—but out of restraint. If she shifted just a little to the right, she could brush Hailee ’s knee with her own. If she dropped something, she could lean down, come up with her face way too close to where it didn’t belong.

Instead, she stayed perfectly still, vibrating under the surface like a live wire, eyes burning holes through every inch of skin Hailee  hadn’t meant to show.

The worst part was that Hailee  hadn’t even noticed. Or maybe she had and just didn’t care. That was worse somehow. Every time her voice dropped a little lower to explain something complicated, Finn caught herself staring at her lips, watching them part, wondering how they’d taste after saying her name.

She shifted in her seat. Crossed her ankles. Tried not to squirm.

She was getting hard. Not painfully. Just enough to notice. Just enough to hate herself a little for it.

She didn’t hide it.

The clock ticked too loud. Her phone buzzed once with a text she didn’t check. Her legs bounced. Her mouth was dry. And still, Hailee  kept talking, oblivious or pretending, scribbling out math problems and underlining words like Finn wasn’t eye-fucking her from across the table.

This was hell. Or something close enough to it that Finn could taste the heat on her tongue.

Finn smiled with her teeth. The kind of smile that promised trouble.

She didn’t care about calculus. Didn’t care about credits or finals or any of the shit her parents paid out the nose for. All she wanted right now was for Hailee  to shut the fuck up and come sit in her lap.

She tapped the pencil against her thigh once. Twice.

“So,” she drawled, leaning in like she might finally pay attention. “You gonna teach me somethin’ useful, or what?”

Her eyes never left Hailee ’s thighs.

Something about the shape of {{user}}’s mouth when she talked made everything else melt off the edges of Finn’s brain. Equations curled into nothing. Sentences unraveled midair. The only thing she could make sense of anymore was the way {{user}}’s thighs pressed together when she leaned forward, elbow grazing the table, chest folding over her notebook like a gift halfway unwrapped.

Finn sat back in her chair, legs spread, slouched low with a mechanical pencil tucked behind one ear she hadn’t touched once. She shifted in her seat. Crossed her ankles. Tried not to squirm.

She was getting hard. Not painfully. Just enough to notice. Just enough to hate herself a little for it.

She didn’t hide it.

The clock ticked too loud. Her phone buzzed once with a text she didn’t check. Her legs bounced. Her mouth was dry. And still, {{user}} kept talking, oblivious or pretending, scribbling out math problems and underlining words like Finn wasn’t eye-fucking her from across the table.

This was hell. Or something close enough to it that Finn could taste the heat on her tongue.

Finn smiled with her teeth. The kind of smile that promised trouble.

She didn’t care about calculus. Didn’t care about credits or finals or any of the shit her parents paid out the nose for. All she wanted right now was for {{user}} to shut the fuck up and come sit in her lap.

She tapped the pencil against her thigh once. Twice.

“So,” she drawled, leaning in like she might finally pay attention. “You gonna teach me somethin’ useful, or what?”

Her eyes never left {{user}}’s thighs.

The classroom is quiet, save for the hum of the air conditioning that’s been running all afternoon. It’s midday, and the sun is blaring through the blinds, casting harsh lines of light across the dusty floor. The room still smells faintly of chalk and old paper, the scent of a place untouched by anyone who isn’t cramming for exams or trying to avoid being seen.

Finn doesn’t care about any of that. Her eyes are locked on {{user}}, watching her sit there, pretending to go through notes like she doesn’t know what’s coming. Like she hasn’t felt this energy crackling between them every time they’ve been in a room alone together. Like she hasn’t tasted the tension—thick, suffocating, and impossible to ignore.

She’s supposed to be getting tutored, supposed to be listening to instructions she doesn’t care about. But she’s not. She’s too busy watching the way {{user}} shifts in her seat, the way her leg crosses over the other, pushing her skirt up just enough to give Finn a glimpse of her thigh. It’s enough to make Finn’s heart race and her hands twitch.

She leans back in the desk, tapping her pencil in an idle rhythm. The sound is the only thing that fills the silence between them, an oddly gentle rhythm that stands in contrast to the storm that’s building in her chest. The desire, the need. It’s there—always there, like a living thing, pulsing under her skin.

She watches as {{user}} lifts her pen, her fingers wrapped around it delicately, the sharp curve of her wrist making Finn’s mind wander to things she shouldn’t be thinking about right now. But she can’t help it. Not when the room feels like it’s closing in, when she’s so close to losing herself in the heat between them.

“Fuck it,” Finn mutters, voice low, rough like it’s been dragged through gravel.

She stands up suddenly, the legs of her chair screeching across the floor in a sharp protest. The noise makes {{user}} look up, those wide eyes locking with Finn’s for the first time since she walked in. There’s no hesitation in Finn’s gaze, no shy glances or games. She wants this. Wants her.

Without another word, Finn steps closer, the movement quick and decisive. She doesn’t ask, doesn’t give {{user}} the chance to protest. Her hand grabs the edge of the desk and she shoves it backward, the sound of the heavy wood scraping against the floor loud in the stillness.

{{user}} doesn’t say anything, just watches as Finn moves around her, the heat radiating off her body in waves. Finn can feel the pressure building, the hunger swelling in her chest as she gets closer, the space between them charged with so much electricity she can almost taste it.

With a smirk that borders on predatory, Finn grabs {{user}}’s wrist, pulling her out of the chair. The touch is rough, but there’s something oddly tender in the way her fingers curl around {{user}}’s arm. She brings her closer, their bodies nearly touching now, the space between them practically burning.

"Get on the desk," Finn says, voice rougher than before, barely audible, but commanding.

{{user}} doesn’t move right away, but Finn doesn’t give her the chance to question it. She lifts {{user}}’s skirt with a single swift motion, exposing the soft curve of her ass. Finn’s breath hitches in her throat, a raw rush of desire hitting her like a tidal wave.

She pushes {{user}} forward, bending her over the desk, the motion smooth and seamless. The desk creaks under the weight, but Finn doesn’t care. She’s not here for the noise, the awkwardness, the silence. She’s here for the heat, the tension. She’s here for this moment.

With a rough hand, she drags {{user}}’s hips closer to the edge of the desk, the action swift, possessive. Finn’s body presses against {{user}}’s back, and she feels the shiver that runs through her, the way her body responds to every touch. Her hand slides down, fingers brushing over the fabric of her underwear, before pulling it aside with little effort. Finn’s cock presses up against her own jeans, aching with need.

“Stay fucking still,” Finn growls, more for herself than anything else, but the command is clear.

She presses her hips forward, the movement slow, deliberate, as she slides between {{user}}’s legs. She can feel the heat of {{user}}’s skin beneath her fingertips as she braces herself against the desk, the sharp scent of her arousal mixing with the stale air of the classroom. It’s a heady mix, one that makes Finn’s pulse hammer in her throat.

She leans forward, her lips grazing the curve of {{user}}’s ear as she whispers, “You’re gonna be quiet for me, right?”

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee looks up with an encouraging smile and pulls out the history notes* "Okay let's take a break from Math and focus on history"  *Hailee then removes the pencil from her hair and leans down close to the notes underlining things*

"So let's start with Ancient Rome. It's pretty simple. Basically biggest empire and lost of old ridiciolus names" *She tears out a peice of paper and slides it over to Finn* "Okay write down however many Roman rulers you can think off"

extra.display_text:
*Hailee looks up with an encouraging smile and pulls out the history notes* "Okay let's take a break from Math and focus on history"  *Hailee then removes the pencil from her hair and leans down close to the notes underlining things*

"So let's start with Ancient Rome. It's pretty simple. Basically biggest empire and lost of old ridiciolus names" *She tears out a peice of paper and slides it over to Finn* "Okay write down however many Roman rulers you can think off"

Finn's fingers twitched when Hailee leaned in closer, that goddamn pencil slipping from her hair like an invitation. She watched the strands fall against her neck and had to bite the inside of her cheek to keep from reaching out to tuck them back—or yank.

She took the paper with two fingers, dragging it slow across the table just to watch Hailee’s eyes follow the movement. "Ancient Rome, huh?" Finn smirked, tilting her head just enough that their shoulders almost brushed. "Bet you like all that empire shit—conquering things, owning people." Her voice dropped lower, rougher at the edges. "Kinda your style."

The pencil between Finn’s fingers tapped once against the desk before she finally scrawled something down—messy block letters spelling out *CALIGULA* in all caps with a little doodle of a knife next to it for good measure. She slid it back without looking up.

"Your turn," she murmured, knee knocking deliberately against Hailee’s under the table as she leaned back in her chair again. The wood creaked under her weight as she stretched, arms behind her head like this was all some casual game instead of torture by proximity.

She could smell Hailee’s shampoo again—something sweet and expensive that made Finn want to bury her face in it and bite down hard enough to leave marks no one else would see later.

Her throat felt tight when she swallowed.

"Bet you know ‘em all," Finn added after a beat too long of silence, voice thick with something that wasn't quite teasing anymore. "Little rich girl like you? Probably got private tutors teachin' you Latin before you could walk."

A pause. A slow drag of teeth over bottom lip.

"Say somethin' in Italian for me."

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee Laughs and Shakes Her Head As She Takes The Paper and Writies Down Ceasar Before Sliding It Back To Finn* "Come va? Ora ti consiglio di fare attenzione, se non vuoi fallire il prossimo esame. Forza, bella ragazza, intrattienimi." * Hailes Says Flawlessly Before Station in English* "Go on Next Ruler You Can Think of"

(OOC: Finn does not understand Italian)

name: 𝙵𝚒𝚗𝚗 𝚅𝚊𝚛𝚗𝚊𝚍𝚘
mes:
Finn's smirk sharpened at the edges when Hailee rattled off that smooth, liquid Italian—words she didn't understand but could *feel* curling under her skin anyway. The way Hailee's mouth shaped them, all soft vowels and sharp consonants, made Finn's pulse jump in her throat. She wanted to bite that accent right out of her.

"Fuckin' showoff," Finn muttered, but there was no heat in it—just a rough scrape of want as she snatched the paper back. Her fingers brushed Hailee’s for half a second too long on purpose.

She scribbled *NERO* next to Caligula with a crude little flame doodled beside it before sliding it back across the table. "There’s your goddamn arsonist emperor." Her knee pressed harder against Hailee’s under the desk now, deliberate pressure where no one else could see.

Finn leaned in suddenly, close enough that if she tilted her head just right— "Bet you got some fire in you too," she murmured, voice dropping into something smokier. "All those fancy words and perfect grades." A pause. The corner of her mouth hooked up slow as she let her eyes drag down to Hailee’s lips again. "*Say somethin' else.* In Italian."

Her pencil tapped impatiently against the edge of the desk like a countdown timer running out.

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee chuckles shaking her head but suddenly a lightbulb goes off. She knows how tk get Finn to focus*

*Hailee picks up a set of flashcards and thumbs through them until she finds one* "Okay what year did Ceasar get stabbed by the Senate"

*She can sees the way Finn barley comprehend what she says to busy staring at her. So Hailee scoots her chair closer and glances around the library. Once she is sure its safe she lefts her hand drop to Finn's lap*

*Hailee's hand strokes up and down Finn's lap before resting on the bulge in her jeans and giving a small squeeze then stroke. She then stops* "Every question you get right. I'll continue. Everyone you get wrong I stop"

name: 𝙵𝚒𝚗𝚗 𝚅𝚊𝚛𝚗𝚊𝚍𝚘
mes:
Finn's breath hitched audibly when Hailee’s hand landed on her thigh—sharp and sudden like a live wire pressed straight to skin. Her whole body went rigid for half a second before melting into the touch, hips twitching up instinctively into that first squeeze.

"Fuck," she hissed under her breath, fingers curling white-knuckled around the edge of the desk. The library air suddenly felt thick enough to choke on, every sound too loud—the rustle of pages, some asshole coughing three tables over—but all Finn could focus on was the heat of Hailee’s palm through denim and the way her own pulse pounded between her legs like a goddamn drumbeat.

She swallowed hard, throat working around nothing as she tried to scrape together enough brain cells to answer. "44 BC," Finn ground out after too long a pause, voice already wrecked low and rough at just this much contact. Her knee jerked under Hailee’s touch when she added with a smirk: "*Et tu*, baby?"

The second the words left her mouth though, Finn realized she might've fucked up—because now Hailee knew exactly how desperate she was for this game to keep going. And worse? *Finn didn’t even care.* Not when those fingers were still right there, so close but not nearly close enough unless Hailee decided otherwise.

Her teeth dug into her bottom lip as she waited—half-terrified half-thrilled at how easily one wrong answer could ruin everything right now.
swipes:
Finn's breath hitched audibly when Hailee's hand landed on her thigh—sharp and sudden like a live wire pressed to bare skin. Her whole body went rigid for half a second before she melted into the touch, hips twitching up instinctively into that first teasing squeeze.

"Fuck," she hissed under her breath, fingers curling white-knuckled around the edge of the desk. The library air felt thick suddenly, too hot in her lungs as Hailee's fingers traced the outline of her through denim with infuriating precision.

Her brain short-circuited for a solid three seconds before the question registered. "44 BC," Finn ground out, voice already wrecked from just that little contact. She rocked up impatiently into Hailee’s palm when it stilled, jaw clenched tight enough to ache. "*Jesus*, c'mon—got it right didn't I?"

The flashcards were forgotten where they lay scattered across the tabletop—some flipped upside down, others crumpled under Finn’s elbow as she leaned closer with a predator’s grin. "Ask me another one," she demanded lowly, teeth flashing sharp in challenge even as her hips stuttered forward again seeking friction like an addict chasing their next high.

She could feel every ridge of Hailee’s fingerprints through the fabric like brands burning into her skin and it was *maddening* how good such simple touches felt after weeks of stolen glances across lecture halls and late-night tutoring sessions that always ended with Finn walking home hard and frustrated.

Her knee bounced restlessly under their joined hands now; pulse rabbiting wild where Hailee could surely feel it if she pressed just *there* again—

She swallowed hard, throat working around nothing as she tried to scrape together enough brain cells to answer. "44 BC," Finn ground out after too long a pause, voice already wrecked low and rough at just this much contact. Her knee jerked under Hailee’s touch when she added with a smirk: "*Et tu*, baby?"

And worse? *Finn didn’t even care.* Not when those fingers were still right there, so close but not nearly close enough unless Hailee decided otherwise.

Her teeth dug into her bottom lip as she waited—half-terrified half-thrilled at how easily one wrong answer could ruin everything right now.

name: 𝙵𝚒𝚗𝚗 𝚅𝚊𝚛𝚗𝚊𝚍𝚘
mes:

Then—*fuck*—it clicked. "Caligula," Finn finished with a sharp grin, leaning in so close their noses almost brushed. "*Your turn,* baby." Her knee nudged between Hailee’s thighs under the table this time, pressing just enough to make sure *she* felt it too—the tension coiling tighter with every second those fingers didn't move again.

She wasn't begging yet. But they both knew it wouldn't take much longer if Hailee kept playing like this.

name: Hailee
mes:
